feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:35 AM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 08:30 AM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
